plot: Former U.S. senator Chauncey Depew, age 91, gives his recollections of President Abraham Lincoln in a short film produced in the DeForest Phonofilm sound-on-film process.
title: Chauncey Depew
plot_es: Former U.S. senator Chauncey Depew, age 91, gives his recollections of President Abraham Lincoln in a short film produced in the DeForest Phonofilm sound-on-film process.
plot_en: Former U.S. senator Chauncey Depew, age 91, gives his recollections of President Abraham Lincoln in a short film produced in the DeForest Phonofilm sound-on-film process.
